toolInput.content:
name: Publish to npm

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  publish:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    permissions:
      contents: read
      id-token: write
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: '20'
          registry-url: 'https://registry.npmjs.org'
      
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci
      
      - name: Build
        run: npm run build
      
      - name: Check if version changed
        id: version-check
        run: |
          PACKAGE_VERSION=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
          NPM_VERSION=$(npm view @timoaus/define-claude-code-hooks@latest version 2>/dev/null || echo "0.0.0")
          
          if [ "$PACKAGE_VERSION" != "$NPM_VERSION" ]; then
            echo "Version changed from $NPM_VERSION to $PACKAGE_VERSION"
            echo "should_publish=true" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
          else
            echo "Version unchanged at $PACKAGE_VERSION"
            echo "should_publish=false" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
          fi
      
      - name: Publish to npm
        if: steps.version-check.outputs.should_publish == 'true'
        run: npm publish --provenance --access public
        env:
          NODE_AUTH_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.NPM_TOKEN }}

        if: steps.version-check.outputs.should_publish == 'true'

        env:
          NODE_AUTH_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.NPM_TOKEN }}

toolResponse.content:
name: Publish to npm

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  publish:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    permissions:
      contents: read
      id-token: write
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: '20'
          registry-url: 'https://registry.npmjs.org'
      
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci
      
      - name: Build
        run: npm run build
      
      - name: Check if version changed
        id: version-check
        run: |
          PACKAGE_VERSION=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
          NPM_VERSION=$(npm view @timoaus/define-claude-code-hooks@latest version 2>/dev/null || echo "0.0.0")
          
          if [ "$PACKAGE_VERSION" != "$NPM_VERSION" ]; then
            echo "Version changed from $NPM_VERSION to $PACKAGE_VERSION"
            echo "should_publish=true" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
          else
            echo "Version unchanged at $PACKAGE_VERSION"
            echo "should_publish=false" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
          fi
      
      - name: Publish to npm
        if: steps.version-check.outputs.should_publish == 'true'
        run: npm publish --provenance --access public
        env:
          NODE_AUTH_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.NPM_TOKEN }}

Update package name and add GitHub Action for npm publishing

- Changed package name to @timoaus/define-claude-code-hooks
- Added GitHub workflow to automatically publish to npm on main branch push
- Workflow includes version change detection to avoid duplicate publishes

EOF
)"
